00011 #ifndef __gtx_color_space_inl__
00012 #define __gtx_color_space_inl__
00013 
00014 #include "gtx_color_space.h"
00015 
00016 namespace glm
00017 {
00018     template <typename T> 
00019     inline _xvec3<T> rgbGTX(const _xvec3<T>& hsv)
00020     {
00021         _xvec3<T> rgb;
00022 
00023             if(hsv.y == 0.0f)
00024                     // achromatic (grey)
00025             rgb = _xvec3<T>(hsv.z);
00026             else
00027             {
00028             // sector 0 to 5
00029             hsv.x /= 60.0f;                        
00030 
00031             int i = glm::floor(hsv.x);
00032             // factorial part of h
00033             float f = hsv.x - i;
00034             float p = hsv.z * (1.0f - hsv.y);
00035             float q = hsv.z * (1.0f - hsv.y * f);
00036             float t = hsv.z * (1.0f - hsv.y * (1.0f - f));
00037 
00038             switch(i)
00039             {
00040             default:
00041                 rgb.r = hsv.v; 
00042                 rgb.g = p; 
00043                 rgb.b = q;
00044                 break;
00045             case 0:
00046                 rgb.r = hsv.v;
00047                 rgb.g = t;
00048                 rgb.b = p;
00049                 break;
00050             case 1:
00051                 rgb.r = q;
00052                 rgb.g = hsv.v;
00053                 rgb.b = p;
00054                 break;
00055             case 2:
00056                 rgb.r = p;
00057                 rgb.g = hsv.v;
00058                 rgb.b = t;
00059                 break;
00060             case 3:
00061                 rgb.r = p;
00062                 rgb.g = q;
00063                 rgb.b = hsv.v;
00064                 break;
00065             case 4:
00066                 rgb.r = t; 
00067                 rgb.g = p; 
00068                 rgb.b = hsv.v;
00069                 break;
00070             }
00071             }
00072     }
00073 
00074     template <typename T> 
00075     inline _xvec3<T> hsvGTX(const _xvec3<T>& rgb)
00076     {
00077         _xvec3<T> hvs = rgb;
00078             float Min   = min(min(rgb.r, rgb.g), rgb.b);
00079             float Max   = max(max(rgb.r, rgb.g), rgb.b);
00080             float Delta = Max - Min;
00081 
00082             hvs.z = Max;                               
00083         
00084             if(Max != 0.0f)
00085             {
00086                     hvs.y = Delta / Max;              
00087 
00088                     if(rgb.r == Max)
00089                             // between yellow & magenta
00090                             hvs.x = (rgb.g - rgb.b) / Delta;
00091                     else
00092                             if(rgb.g == Max)
00093                                     // between cyan & yellow
00094                                     hvs.x = 2.0f + (rgb.b - rgb.r) / Delta;
00095                             else
00096                                     // between magenta & cyan
00097                                     hvs.x = 4.0f + (rgb.r - rgb.g) / Delta;
00098             
00099                     // Conversion in degrees
00100                     hvs.x *= 60.0f;                               
00101                     if(hvs.x < 0.0f) 
00102                 hvs.x += 360.0f;
00103             }
00104             else
00105             {
00106                     // If r = g = b = 0 then s = 0, h is undefined
00107                     hvs.y =  0.0f;
00108                     hvs.x = -1.0f;
00109             }
00110     }
00111 }
